puakma.addin.http
Class HTTP

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread

All Implemented Interfaces:
ErrorDetect, java.lang.Runnable
public class HTTP
extends pmaAddIn

HTTPServer is Puakma's web server. It is loaded as an addin

getDefaultHostURL

public java.lang.String getDefaultHostURL(java.lang.String szRequestedHost)
returns the default url for a given host or URI from the properties file. Note if the url was http://server.com/booster we need to check for "/booster" and "/booster/"
